casebody.data:
[Cite as 01109/2003 Case Announcements, 2003-Ohio-23.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

January 9, 2003

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2002-1877. State ex rel. Wheeling-Pittsburgh Steel Corp. v. Indus. Comm.

Franklin App. No. 01AP-1285, 2002-Ohio-4854. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for extension of time to file merit brief pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. XIV(6)(C),

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for extension of time be, and hereby is, granted, and appellant’s merit brief is due on or before February 5, 2003.
